extendedInfo.description: Virtual Film Viewer is intended for the owners and users of Virtual Film Maker for Android (both 2.2 and 3.0).Virtual Film Viewer provides further grouping existing virtual films into customizable categories and playlists and allows playing back any number of virtual films sequentally.Virtual film Viewer 2.2 is intended for Android 2.2 tablets and is available in both free and paid ('Pro') versions on Android Market.Virtual Film Viewer 3.0 is intended for Android 3.0 tablets and is available in both free and paid ('Pro') versions on Android Market.Virtual film Viewer supports English, Spanish, Russian and French. The application is simple enough for a child to use and features a stylish interface that will encourage you to use it over and over.Try free version, Enjoy and then Buy 'Pro'!Please, find more details, screenshots, videos, feature comparison and positive customer raves on the developer's web site. More demo videos are available on "VirtualFilmsSoftware" YouTube channel http://www.youtube.com/user/VirtualFilmsSoftware#p/uPS. For 'Browse' button to work, the external file manager should be installed. Both 'OI File Manager' and 'ES File Explorer' are supported.
